alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 28 at 1:52PM PST until December 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Patches of ice may form on roadways where temperatures have dipped below freezing.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.visibilities, the Freezing Fog Advisory will be allowed to expire

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
